system.requirements:
Tier 3; 2+ Cybernetics, Tech-Use +10 
Aptitudes: Tech, Toughness
system.effect:
Character gains Machine(X) Trait, where X is equal to Half the Cybernetics they possess (roundewd up), to a maximum amount equal to their Toughness Bonus. This value updates if they get or lose cybernetics.
Only Applies to Cybernetics such as Replacement Limbs, Organs, Syb-systems, and Mechadendrites, not Traits or Talents that give similar effects.
